JUDGES: Isabelle Berro-Lefèvre;Karel Jungwiert;Mark Villiger;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Peer Lorenzen;Rait Maruste;Renate Jaeger
TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . He was represented before the ORG by Mr PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE .
The applicant is the father of CARDINAL children , born in DATE and DATE . Since the couple 's separation in DATE the children have been living with their mother .
On DATE the mother lodged a request to be granted sole parental authority over the children in order to return with them to her country of origin , GPE .
On DATE ORG ( ORG ) rejected the request .
On DATE ORG ( Landgericht ) quashed ORG decision and granted the mother sole parental authority over both children .
On DATE the applicant lodged a complaint which was rejected by ORG on DATE .
On DATE ORG refused to admit the applicant 's constitutional complaint for adjudication . This decision was served on the applicant 's counsel on DATE .
